name: Boopers
description:
Controls:

Z = Attack  

X = Special

C = Dash

Space = Jump and Doublejump

WASD and ARROWS = Directional input (you can attack upwards and downwards!)

R = Restart

U = Fullscreen

(also works with xbox controller)

X Button = Attack  

Y Button = Special

B Button = Dash

A Button = Jump and Doublejump

Joystick/Dpad = Directional input (you can attack upwards and downwards!)

Select  = Fullscreen
